name: Strand of the Tangled Knot
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Legacy of the First World © 2017, Paizo Inc.
components: V, S, M/DF (a small knot of twin)
text: The next single attack made against you takes a –10 penalty. If that attack is a critical hit, it is instead treated as a normal hit.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势，材料/法器（一个小小的绳结）
text_zh: 你模仿着绿母编制传奇绳结的方式，以此来巧妙地改变你的命运。下一次针对你的攻击会受到-10减值。如果这次攻击重击了，它将转而被视为普通的命中。
